ItemBGDesc: The miracle medicine Mr. Xiyan made up in the story. He claims these medicines have parallels in real life, but you're not silly enough to believe in that.\n\n"What the warrior beholds is a mushroom that seems to waft in and out of existence. This is no mere mushroom. It sits within a state between existence and non-existence, constantly fluctuating between the real and the imaginary... It's called the 'Life-Death Polypore'."
